snippet: A jury in Union County, N.J., said a jackpot winner had to share with the members of his betting pool.
abstract: Jury in Union County, NJ, says Mega Millions jackpot winner Americo Lopes has to share the $38.5 million in winnings with the five members of his betting pool; when he won in November 2009 he told no one except lottery officials and cashed in the ticket as if it were his alone.

byline.original: By JAMES BARRON and TIM STELLOH

lead_paragraph: A jury in Union County, N.J., said a jackpot winner had to share with the members of his betting pool.

headline.seo: Americo Lopes, Lottery Winner, Ordered to Share With His Betting Pool
headline.main: Worker Who Hid Lottery Win Must Share $38.5 Million Prize
headline.print_headline: Worker Who Hid Lottery Win Must Share $38.5 Million Prize
